name: Gligar

evolution.description: Gligar can evolve into Gliscor at level 10 and above while holding a Razor Fang at night. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Fly Scorpion Pokémon. Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s attack or damage bonuses cannot be decreased by an opponent’s moves.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming poisoned.
